vocabInfos.lsjDefs: that fell from Zeus , [Refs 5th c.BC] (Middle Liddel)
vocabInfos.shortDef: (the image) fallen from heaven (given by the pagan god Zeus)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
(the image) fallen from heaven (given by the pagan god Zeus)
which fell from Jupiter, or heaven; τοῦ διοπετοῦς, i.e. ἀγάλματος, image or statue; for discussion of ellipsis see grammars, Acts 19:35*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 字意: 從宙斯落下的
2) 從天上落下來的 (徒 19:35)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 字意: 从宙斯落下的
2) 从天上落下来的 (徒 19:35)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: từ trời rơi xuống; từ thần Xút / thần Dớt
